backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, admin‑controlled product CRUD, and order request handling with access control and migration hook.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module converting old order requests by adding default delivery address fields and shippingFee, preserving other state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests related to delivery address and shipping‑fee updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing all frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme CSS variables for light and dark modes with color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root setting up TanStack Router, theme, layout, and routes for storefront, order flow, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen showing an access denied message with a return‑to‑shop button.
frontend/src/components/AddToOrderContro: Component providing quantity controls and add/update/remove logic for order draft items with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderReque: Admin panel listing order requests with totals, details, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductAdm: Admin product management table supporting creation, editing, deletion, and stock toggling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Modal form component for creating or updating products with validation and price conversion.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Wrapper enforcing admin authentication and authorization, showing loading or denial states as needed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, branding, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation, user info, cart button, login, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card showing image, details, price, stock status, and add-to-order controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductDiscovery: Search and filter bar for products with scent selection and clear-filters option.
frontend/src/components/ProductImage.tsx: Product image component with placeholder fallback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Exports the store’s merchant UPI ID for payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorState.ts: Wraps useActor to expose loading, ready, and error states plus a retry helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, deleting, and toggling stock status of products using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks to fetch, update, and check admin status of the current user via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, loading, login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDraft.ts: Manages a locally stored draft order with item add/update/remove and price normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderRequests.ts: Provides queries and mutations for order request retrieval, submission, normalization, and deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID with price normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches all products or in‑stock products with normalization and caching options.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus a custom container class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders an admin dashboard with tabbed views for managing products and order requests.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a confirmation card after an order is submitted and provides a button to return to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/OrderRequestPage.tsx: Handles order form input, calculates totals, validates UPI details, and submits order requests.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed product information with add‑to‑order controls and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontCatalogPage: Shows the product catalog with search, scent filtering, actor state handling, and a hero section.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities for converting actor and network errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Contains helpers for normalizing, converting, and formatting prices between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/shipping.ts: Implements shipping fee logic, offering free shipping for Gurugram and a flat fee elsewhere.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, goals, known issues, and existing features for the incense shop app.
